notes:
**[UPDATE FOR FREJA]**
Since Freja has a lot more damage built into her kit, to be able to sustain the damage, utilizing [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) in Round 1 is fine over [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da).

Round 1 is very basic, and pretty much all people utilize the same items and Power.

There's honestly not many other ways to do Round 1 for Mercy.

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

If there's a Reaper or Freja, I take Armoured Vest instead of First Aid Kit just to tank any flanks that happen in Round 1. Otherwise, this isn't worth getting over First Aid Kit, since Mercy regens faster than other supports, and having that proc 33% faster is better than armour.

notes:
**[NO UPDATES ON ROUND 2, IT PLAYS THE SAME VERSUS A FREJA]** - I have updated the option items.

In Round 2 you should have just enough cash to be able to buy [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca). If you have to sell *everything*, that's okay, this build is focusing on damage output of the overall team and enhancing the TTK (time-to-kill) of other players/abilities.

Typically, I sell all of my items and then re-buy [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf), or [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418). [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) is really good in Round 2 for the movement speed it gives and seeing flanks from low enemies.

If it's a really good round, I can sometimes speed-run [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e). This is a rare occurrence, but sometimes it happens on more close rounds.

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.
You should no longer need this item because of the 50 armour provided by Chain Evoker.

notes:
**[ROUND 3 HAS BEEN UPDATED FOR FREJA]**

Please read the Power's note for reasons on picking [Glass Extra Full](item_659ff350-8602-42cd-b5f9-f4da7e5e912b)! If you feel you need more healing in Round 3, replace it with [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) this round instead of Round 5.

Round 3 is where the build gets tricky with item pairing. You're going to want to start stacking weapon power and attack speed at an even amount. The best combination I've found for this specific build Round 3 is [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) + [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e).

If you need to survive better, please replace [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) with [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) until they get more than 1 player on [Codebreaker](item_caa96c7e-655f-4d03-9bd9-0f41937fec27).

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

Overhealth is one of the few types of health in Overwatch that isn't countered by a weapon type, so having this Power early on to help your teammates win duels is strong. Topping up allies while in spawn before the match starts gives your team an advantage, as well.
Taking this item over Talon Modification Module helps with keeping the 1:1 ratio of weapon power / attack speed, while also giving you a 5% cooldown reduction on guardian angel.
Versus a Freja, taking this item over weapon power can be better purely for survivability. If you survive, your team survives.

notes:
**[ROUND 4 HAS BEEN UPDATED FOR FREJA]**

You should be able to sell [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) this round for the items recommended in the build. However, if you're still struggling to stay alive, replace it [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) plus [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) or [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6). This is a better combination, since most players will have opted into [Codebreaker](item_caa96c7e-655f-4d03-9bd9-0f41937fec27) by this round.

If you're opting into the survivability, replace [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) for [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391). This is because it offers only weapon power, whereas the others are going to offer you more utility to your kit that you need.

Continue on with the build if you don't need survivability! [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) is the next item for the build.

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

Overhealth is one of the few types of health in Overwatch that isn't countered by a weapon type, so having this Power early on to help your teammates win duels is strong. Topping up allies while in spawn before the match starts gives your team an advantage, as well.

notes:
**[UPDATED]**

If you chose [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) as your Power for Round 3, please pick [Glass Extra Full](item_659ff350-8602-42cd-b5f9-f4da7e5e912b) for this round!

This round, sell [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) if you had it. The additional 50 health from [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) should help keep you alive longer.

The Round 7 build is going to heavily focus on weapon power and mobility. Starting in this round, if you didn't get it already, please get [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931). If you can also get [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5) without sacrificing your weapon power / attack speed, please do so.

Fill in your items with any weapon power / attack speed items you like to play with. For this build, I like to keep [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) and [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e).

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

Overhealth is one of the few types of health in Overwatch that isn't countered by a weapon type, so having this Power early on to help your teammates win duels is strong. Topping up allies while in spawn before the match starts gives your team an advantage, as well.
Mercy is typically flying around and helping allies where she can, so this Power in Round 5 is scaled to be impactful immediately depending upon your weapon power.

notes:
**[UPDATED]**
Round 6 will get the secondary movement ability, [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5). This, combined with [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) makes for exceptional movement that allows for amazing freedom. It takes a few games to get used to, but it really reminds me of how much potential Guardian Angel has!

Starting this round, you're also going to want to upgrade your weapon power / attack speed items.
Swap [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) for [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448).
If you can swap [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) for [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124), please do so.

Add on any additional items suggested for your 6th slot, or substitute if you're low on money. Replace the Mercy-specific movement items with movement speed items (these do affect how fast you can move while flying in GA).

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

Overhealth is one of the few types of health in Overwatch that isn't countered by a weapon type, so having this Power early on to help your teammates win duels is strong. Topping up allies while in spawn before the match starts gives your team an advantage, as well.
Mercy is typically flying around and helping allies where she can, so this Power in Round 5 is scaled to be impactful immediately depending upon your weapon power.

notes:
**[UPDATED]**
Since they've changed the price of all the items, I've changed which items you'll want to get in this build. Instead of focusing on glocking in Round 7, focus on healing / team pocketing (sad, I know). You can still glock! But the items won't focus on that anymore.

If you didn't replace [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) with [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) last round, please do so this round.
Pick [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) instead of [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce), but feel free to swap the two around depending on how you play. Please read their descriptions in your own time and choose how you want to proceed!

round_upgrades.notes: This item scales the best from Round 1 to 7, and has no range on the attached beam - that I can find - so it's best to get early and not have to worry about choosing later on.

Overhealth is one of the few types of health in Overwatch that isn't countered by a weapon type, so having this Power early on to help your teammates win duels is strong. Topping up allies while in spawn before the match starts gives your team an advantage, as well.
Mercy is typically flying around and helping allies where she can, so this Power in Round 5 is scaled to be impactful immediately depending upon your weapon power.
This Power allows for Valk to automatically target healing and damage amp every ally within view, so we don't have to bother with that or beam management! Glock away, besties.
